mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groups (groupName, category, region, district, description, groupImage, maxParticipants, question) VALUES (#{groupName}, #{category}, #{region}, #{district}, #{description}, #{groupImage}, #{maxParticipants}, #{question})
mapper.select: select regionName from regions where regionId = #{regionId}
select districtName from districts where districtId = #{districtId}

select g.groupName, g.groupImage, g.groupType, r.regionName, d.districtName from `group` g join interest i on g.groupInterestId = i.interestId join regions r on g.groupRegionId = r.regionId join districts d on g.groupDistrictId = d.districtId where g.groupInterestId = #{interestId}
select * from `group` order by groupId desc
